route-policy.rpl-route-policy: route-policy IPV6-CRAN-IN袜2E60  if as-path in (ios-regex '_23253_') or as-path in IPV6-PEER-LIST or destination in IPV6-BB2-PREFIXES then袜2E60    # Drop prefixes with CBONE ASN in path or BB peers and transits or BB2 prefixes袜2E60    drop袜2E60  elseif destination in IPV6-COMCAST-AGGREGATES then袜2E60    if community matches-any CRAN-PUBLIC-ROUTES then袜2E60      set community (7922:2800) additive袜2E60      set med 0袜2E60    elseif community matches-any (*:2005) then袜2E60      set community (7922:2800, 7922:999) additive袜2E60    else袜2E60      set community (7922:2800, 7922:999) additive袜2E60      set med 0袜2E60    endif袜2E60  elseif community matches-any (7922:2900) then袜2E60    set community (7922:2800) additive袜2E60    set med 0袜2E60  else袜2E60    drop袜2E60  endif袜2E60  set origin igp袜2E60  apply SET-LOCAL-PREFERENCE袜2E60end-policy袜2E60

route-policy IPV6-CRAN-OUT袜3750  if destination in IPV6-LEAK-EDIA-PFX then袜3750    # Send EDIA prefixes to allow multihomed traffic-engineering袜3750    set community (7922:2905)袜3750    pass袜3750  elseif destination in IPV6-COMCAST-AGGREGATES then袜3750    if community matches-any (7922:1100) then袜3750      # Permit IBONE originated aggregates袜3750      pass袜3750    elseif community matches-any (7922:1000) then袜3750      # Permit IBONE Infrastructure prefix袜3750      pass袜3750    elseif community matches-any (7922:2800) then袜3750      # Permit All CRAN prefixes袜3750      pass袜3750    else袜3750      drop袜3750    endif袜3750  elseif community matches-any (7922:2900) then袜3750    # Permit all CCS customer blocks袜3750    pass袜3750  elseif community matches-any (7922:[3000..3999]) then袜3750    # Permit all Peer blocks袜3750    pass袜3750  else袜3750    # Drop untagged prefixes袜3750    drop袜3750  endif袜3750  set med igp-cost袜3750  delete community not in (7922:*)袜3750end-policy袜3750
route-policy IPV6-NEXT-HOP-TRACKING衫5E20  if destination in (::/0 ge 64) then衫5E20    pass衫5E20  endif衫5E20end-policy衫5E20
route-policy POLICY-IN衫6210  pass衫6210  done衫6210end-policy衫6210

route-policy SET-LOCAL-PREFERENCE衫6FB0  if community matches-any (7922:290) then衫6FB0    # Set LP=290 if prefix has community 7922:290衫6FB0    set local-preference 290衫6FB0  elseif community matches-any (7922:250) then衫6FB0    # Set LP=250 if prefix has community 7922:250衫6FB0    set local-preference 250衫6FB0  elseif community matches-any (7922:150) then衫6FB0    # Set LP=150 if prefix has community 7922:150衫6FB0    set local-preference 150衫6FB0  elseif community matches-any (7922:100) then衫6FB0    # Set LP=100 if prefix has community 7922:100衫6FB0    set local-preference 100衫6FB0  else衫6FB0    # All remaining prefixes, set LP to 300衫6FB0    set local-preference 300衫6FB0  endif衫6FB0end-policy衫6FB0

as-path-set.rplas-path-set: as-path-set IPV6-PEER-LIST衫7620  # List of all IBONE IPv6 Peers and Transit providers 17MAY2016衫7620  ios-regex '_209_',衫7620  ios-regex '_701_',衫7620  ios-regex '_812_',衫7620  ios-regex '_174_',衫7620  ios-regex '_237_',衫7620  ios-regex '_286_',衫7620  ios-regex '_577_',衫7620  ios-regex '_852_',衫7620  ios-regex '_1239_',衫7620  ios-regex '_1257_',衫7620  ios-regex '_1273_',衫7620  ios-regex '_1280_',衫7620  ios-regex '_1668_',衫7620  ios-regex '_2516_',衫7620  ios-regex '_2828_',衫7620  ios-regex '_2914_',衫7620  ios-regex '_3257_',衫7620  ios-regex '_3292_',衫7620  ios-regex '_3320_',衫7620  ios-regex '_3356_',衫7620  ios-regex '_3491_',衫7620  ios-regex '_4589_',衫7620  ios-regex '_4637_',衫7620  ios-regex '_4725_',衫7620  ios-regex '_4766_',衫7620  ios-regex '_5400_',衫7620  ios-regex '_6128_',衫7620  ios-regex '_6327_',衫7620  ios-regex '_6453_',衫7620  ios-regex '_6461_',衫7620  ios-regex '_6762_',衫7620  ios-regex '_6830_',衫7620  ios-regex '_6939_',衫7620  ios-regex '_7018_',衫7620  ios-regex '_7473_',衫7620  ios-regex '_7843_',衫7620  ios-regex '_11164_',衫7620  ios-regex '_12956_',衫7620  ios-regex '_17676_',衫7620  ios-regex '_22773_',衫7620  ios-regex '_33071_'衫7620end-set衫7620

prefix-set.rpl-prefix-set: prefix-set IPV6-COMCAST-AGGREGATES衫7D00  #List of all Comcast aggregates (updated 25 May 2015)衫7D00  2001:558::/29 le 128,衫7D00  2601::/20 le 128,衫7D00  2603:2000::/20 le 128,衫7D00  2603:3000::/24 le 128衫7D00end-set衫7D00
